alert.note: Alert for East Baton Rouge; East Feliciana (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 27 at 7:35PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central East Feliciana and northwestern East Baton Rouge Parishes through 800 PM CDT... At 734 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Zachary, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Zachary, Baker, Jackson, Clinton, Slaughter, Wilson and Pride. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
